Start a Franchise in your region

From the most famous top-ranked media outlet in the cryptocurrency world

Become a Franchise

Your Benefits

Cointelegraph brand

The ability to step up impact and growth of your own brand in a rapidly expanding market

A well-established business with efficient internal processes

An opportunity to earn by monetizing local advertising resources

A ready-to-use publishing platform and website

Sales, marketing and tech support

Optional use of our sales department

Your team must be able to:

Invest in the Franchise and settle monthly personnel and marketing expenses in a timely manner

Organize flawless operation of the Franchise in compliance with the Cointelegraph brand policy

Increase influence in your local community and conduct sales by monetizing local advertising resources

Perform and maintain smart marketing including use of social media

Translate all of our articles and create at least 2 unique articles per day

Optional: organize events in your region

Here is a portrait of our ideal franchisees:

Respected experts in the local community with connections to related businesses

Experienced in business and business management

Interested in investing in businesses and looking for opportunities

Payback period

18–36 months

Revenue sharing

You get:

80%

of revenue when closing deals independently

40%

of revenue when using the CT sales department

Daniel Seman
Head of Franchise and regional development

Become a Franchise

You know all about us, now tell us about you! Please write in detail about yourself and your company. We're looking for experienced partners with serious intentions.
